alert.note: Alert for Bay; Genesee; Midland; Saginaw; Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 9:50AM EDT until March 30 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Bay, Saginaw, Midland, Shiawassee and Genesee Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could will impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and sleet develops around midnight and then changes over to freezing rain quickly long after midnight which then continues into Wednesday morning. Temperatures will rise above freezing by noon Wednesday, supporting just rain or drizzle for the afternoon.
info.instruction: Untreated road and walking surfaces are expected to become slick and hazardous. Extra caution and slower travel will likely be needed during the morning commute.
